updates.delete_expired: function (doc, req) { if (doc.timestamp < req.query.mindate) { doc._deleted = true; return [doc, 'deleted']; } else return [doc, doc._id] }
updates.log: function(doc, req) { if (doc === null) doc = {}; var fields = JSON.parse(req.body); doc.log.push(fields.record); doc.last_update = fields.record.timestamp; var resp = doc; delete resp._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(resp)]; }
updates.state: function(doc, req) { if (doc === null) doc = {}; doc.state = req.body.state; var resp = doc; delete resp._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(doc)]; }
updates.edit: function(doc, req) { if (doc === null) doc = {}; var fields = JSON.parse(req.body); for (var i in fields) { doc[i] = fields[i] } var resp = doc; delete resp._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(resp)]; }
